forest.name: Forest
forest.desc: You can see town houses on the horizon. If it's safe, you can find something for yourself in the houses.

town square.name: Town Square
town square.desc: You've arrived at the town center; you can try entering the houses around you.

middle house workshop.name: Town House - Workshop
middle house workshop.desc: A dusty workshop smelling of sawdust and oil. Tools hang on the walls.

big house hallway.name: Town House - Hallway
big house hallway.desc: The floorboards creak slightly under your feet here.

big house guest room.name: Town House - Guest Room
big house guest room.desc: A smaller, simpler room. It looks like it hasn't been used in a while.

deep forest.name: Deep Forest
deep forest.desc: The trees are so thick here that they block out the sun. You feel like you're being watched.

cliffs.name: Cliffs
cliffs.desc: You are standing on the edge of extremly high cliffs. The wind is howling...

safe road.name: Safe Road
safe road.desc: You're traveling on a well-lit road that looks safe. Guards are visible in the distance. You're about to escape!

safe road2.name: Safe Road
safe road2.desc: You're traveling on a well-lit road that looks safe. Guards are visible in the distance. You're about to escape!

abondoned camp.name: Abondoned Camp
abondoned camp.desc: You've come to an abandoned campsite. People who camped here may have left some belongings behind.

lighted road.name: Lighted Road
lighted road.desc: You're traveling on a well-lit road that looks safe. Guards are visible in the distance. You're about to escape!

woods.name: Woods
woods.desc: It is unnaturally quiet. Not even the birds are singing. Something is wrong.

deep forest2.name: Deep Forest
deep forest2.desc: This place doesn't look safe, you should be careful. Also, you can see smoke in the distance; someone has probably set up camp. It might be someone who knows the area.

bandit camp.name: Bandit Camp
bandit camp.desc: A cold shiver runs down your spine. This place reeks of death.

old road.name: Old Road
old road.desc: This place doesn't seem very safe, you should be careful.

old road2.name: Old Road
old road2.desc: There are fresh footprints in the mud that don't look like they belong to a soldier.

forest2.name: Forest
forest2.desc: This place doesn't seem very safe, you should be careful.

forest3.name: Forest
forest3.desc: This place doesn't seem very safe, you should be careful.

forest4.name: Forest
forest4.desc: This place doesn't seem very safe, you should be careful.

town hall enterance.name: Town Hall - Enterance
town hall enterance.desc: The entrance is silent. A dusty reception desk sits empty in the corner.

archives.name: Town Hall - Archives
archives.desc: The room smells of old paper and decaying parchment. Rows of shelves tower over you.

treasury.name: Town Hall - Treasury
treasury.desc: The air is cold here. Thick stone walls suggest this room was built to keep things safe.

town hall hallway.name: Town Hall - Hallway
town hall hallway.desc: A long corridor stretches out. Portraits of past mayors seem to watch you from the walls.

council chamber.name: Town Hall - Council Chamber
council chamber.desc: A heavy oak table sits in the center, worn smooth by years of use. Stacks of tax ledgers and a dried-up inkwell are left on top.

mayor's office.name: Town Hall - Mayor's Office
mayor's office.desc: It looks like someone left in a hurry. Papers are scattered across the fancy desk.

storage.name: Town Hall - Storage
storage.desc: Just a small storage room. There is barely enough space to turn around.

courtroom.name: Town Hall - Courtroom
courtroom.desc: Rows of empty wooden benches face the front. You feel like you are on trial.
